languages.text: "Вас жестоко пытали, господин дознаватель. Позвольте мне идти впереди и закрывать вас от ударов — вы слишком ценны, чтобы рисковать".

traits.locale_text: "Вас жестоко пытали, господин дознаватель. Позвольте мне идти впереди и закрывать вас от ударов — вы слишком ценны, чтобы рисковать".

languages.text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
languages.original_text: "Вас жестоко пытали, господин дознаватель. Позвольте мне идти впереди и закрывать вас от ударов — вы слишком ценны, чтобы рисковать".

traits.locale_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
"You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
"You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
"You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
"You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
"You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

languages.text: 「インテロゲイター殿、あなたは残酷な拷問に耐えてきました。ここは私が前に出て攻撃を防ぎます。あなたは危険を冒すにはあまりにも貴重な人です」
languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

traits.locale_text: 「インテロゲイター殿、あなたは残酷な拷問に耐えてきました。ここは私が前に出て攻撃を防ぎます。あなたは危険を冒すにはあまりにも貴重な人です」

languages.text: "Ihr habt brutale Folter erlitten, Meister Interrogator. Gestattet mir, voranzugehen und Euch vor Angriffen zu beschützen. Ihr seid zu wertvoll, um solche Risiken einzugehen."
languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt brutale Folter erlitten, Meister Interrogator. Gestattet mir, voranzugehen und Euch vor Angriffen zu beschützen. Ihr seid zu wertvoll, um solche Risiken einzugehen."

languages.text: « Vous avez subi une torture brutale, maître interrogateur. Permettez-moi de passer devant pour vous protéger des attaques. Vous nous êtes trop précieux pour prendre de tels risques. »
languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez subi une torture brutale, maître interrogateur. Permettez-moi de passer devant pour vous protéger des attaques. Vous nous êtes trop précieux pour prendre de tels risques. »

languages.text: «Ha padecido una tortura brutal, maese interrogador. Permítame que tome la delantera y le proteja de más ataques; es usted demasiado valioso para correr semejantes riesgos».
languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

traits.locale_text: «Ha padecido una tortura brutal, maese interrogador. Permítame que tome la delantera y le proteja de más ataques; es usted demasiado valioso para correr semejantes riesgos».

languages.text: “你遭受了残酷的折磨，审讯官大师。请允许我走在你前面，保护你免受攻击。你太有价值了，不能冒着这样的风险。”
languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

traits.locale_text: “你遭受了残酷的折磨，审讯官大师。请允许我走在你前面，保护你免受攻击。你太有价值了，不能冒着这样的风险。”

languages.text: "Acımasız işkencelerden geçtin Üstat Sorgucu. İzninle ön safa geçip seni koruyayım. Riske atılamayacak kadar değerlisin."
languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."

traits.locale_text: "Acımasız işkencelerden geçtin Üstat Sorgucu. İzninle ön safa geçip seni koruyayım. Riske atılamayacak kadar değerlisin."

languages.original_text: "You have suffered brutal torture, Master Interrogator. Allow me to take the front and shield you from attacks — you are too valuable to take such risks."
